entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
